title: Acrolinx
description: Acrolinx is a Content Governance Solution, a software platform designed to create amazing content.
jobDescription: As a Senior Frontend Engineer, I participated on development of web application for administration. My daily task was to implement features in form of React functional components written in Typescript and frontend testing using Jest and React Testing Library.

title: terminal.com.co

title: CareConnect365
description: CareConnect365 was a US based start-up idea, with focus on a technology designed specifically for seniors to help them stay independent, healthy and connected to family and friends. My team and I, we worked on a remake of an existing native application whose purpose was to simplify communication among family and elderly relatives. We were a small team in charge of the whole development lifecycle. The part of our assignment was also to develop missing backend features where we used Node.js and Hapi.js web framework combined with MongoDB. The main FE challenges were in design and our main effort was to make the new app user-friendly by presenting features in more accessible way.

title: Infocyte
description: Infocyte is a cybersecurity company providing the leading platform for Incident Response and delivering cost-effective MDR services.
jobDescription: I contributed with modifications of Infocyte's administrative UI, where the goal was to reduce the boilerplate and also to improve its performance. This was achieved by replacement of Redux state management for MobX and also by implementation of React performance optimization hooks.
